item.title: Etihad introduces loyalty card in partnership with Visa's walletplus
item.description:
Source: Etihad Guest website. Etihad Airways’ loyalty program, Etihad Guest, now allows members to use walletplus, a Visa-powered payment system, directly through their Etihad Guest cards. Members can add travel funds to their cards and exchange them for 11 different international currencies for use while traveling. This prepaid card allows travelers to manage their money by securing favorable exchange rates in advance, eliminating the need for bank transfers or currency exchanges upon arrival...
